Intuit QuickBooks
Great talking to you, {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}!
Welcome to the world’s #1 online accounting software.
We appreciate your interest in QuickBooks and signing up for a free trial. QuickBooks is the world’s #1 online accounting software with 1.5 million subscribers worldwide. It is designed for small businesses, like yours, to help you:
Get paid faster with easy invoicing Create invoices, email them to customers and track payments
Save time in managing your books of accounts Mobile apps on iOS and Android, online banking integration and integrated payroll
Stay in control of your business with real-time insights Monitor business performance, balance sheets, P&L and tax reports with a click
That’s not all, now QuickBooks comes at an affordable price of ₹4,999 per subscription per year. Please feel free to give me a call or write to me – my contact details are given below. Looking forward to speaking with you soon!
{!User.Name} Quickbooks Consultant {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email} You can also call our small business helpline at 1800 102 5599 (Toll free. Mon-Sat, 9:30am – 6pm)
